naslov: Luksuzna Vila 160m2, pogled na more,privatni parking i bazen-Dugoročno (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Posredujemo u dugoročnom najmu prekrasne luksuzne Vile na dva kata ukupne stambene površine 180m2 sa okućnicom 650m2. Vila se sastoji od tri spavaće sobe od kojih svaka ima svoje kupatilo sa wc-om, velikog dnevnog boravka spojenog sa blagovaonom i kuhinjom. U prizemlju je velika terasa sa bazenom i pogledom na more. Na katu je također terasa sa otvorenim pogledom na more. Ispred Vile je garaža i parking za 6 automobila. Ispred objekta uskoro dolazi ljetna kuhinja sa roštiljem. Ovo je prvo useljenje pa je sve novo i svi uređaji su pod garancijom. Potpuno je opremljena svim tehničkim uređajima, velikim TV-om, kaminom, ambi-light rasvjetom izvana i iznutra, internetom i potpuno je klimatizirana. Lokacija ove nekretnine je u mirnom dijelu Donje Podstrane, predio Žminjača gdje se nalazi još nekoliko luksuznih vila. •mjesečni najam je 5000€ •depozit se vraća na kraju najma 5000€ •agencijska provizija je u visini mjesečnog najma Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Kontakt:  091/561-5115 ŽELJANA Luxury Villa 160m2, sea view, private parking and swimming pool - Long term We mediate in the long-term rental of a beautiful luxury villa on two floors with a total living area of 180m2 with a garden of 650m2. The villa consists of three bedrooms, each of which has its own bathroom with toilet, a large living room connected to the dining room and kitchen. On the ground floor there is a large terrace with a pool and a view of the sea. There is also a terrace on the first floor with an open view of the sea. In front of the Villa is a garage and parking for 6 cars. A summer kitchen with a barbecue will soon be located in front of the building. This is the first move in, so everything is new and all appliances are under warranty. It is fully equipped with all technical devices, a large TV, a fireplace, ambi-light lighting outside and inside, internet and it is fully air-conditioned. The location of this property is in a quiet part of Donja Podstrana, the district of Žminjača, where there are several other luxury villas. • monthly rent is €5,000 • the €5,000 deposit is returned at the end of the lease • the agency commission is equal to the monthly rent Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Contact: +385915615115 ŽELJANA
